name: Knife Hit: Fruit Smasher
description:
Time to sharpen your knife hit skills and up your game! Prove your knife hitting skills in this fruit smashing game with one of the best knife hit games

Unlock newer knives at every time when you break your high score.

It is very easy to start. Aim the fruit target, tap your screen and hit and break bosses one by one. The more you hit, the more knives you can obtain. Hit bonus round in every 50 fruits that you smash and get a valuable knife!

There are more than 10 knifes and different fruits, vegetables and fast foods for you to smash and compete with your friends and share your high score on social media

>>Download for FREE! Knife Hit : Fruit Smasher is ready for you to hit!
